body:
For non-functional metadata, such as proposed end date, and responsible part, I propose a "free form" YAML field (or other structured data) that you can put any metadata you want in. How does that sound?

As for disable ts, we already plan on changing the enabled flag to be per-revision, so this will be apparent in the revision history.

I'm not sure what you mean by "previous iteration for all studies". Can you elaborate on this?

Finally, making sampling percentage first class: I think I would rather go the opposite direction with this, and provide better tools for manipulating and processing filters. This is longer term though, and may be unreasonable.
